As If We Didn't Have Enough Reasons Already, Ranveer Makes Us Swoon With His 'Deepika' Mehendi
As If We Didn't Have Enough Reasons Already, Ranveer Makes Us Swoon With His 'Deepika' Mehendi
Undoubtedly, wedding is the most special event in anyone’s life. It’s the beginning of a new phase full of love and happiness – the beginning of a happily ever after, as they say.
For Deepika Padukone and Ranveer Singh as well, it was the beginning of a happily ever after. Solemnising their relationship of six years, Deepika and Ranveer Singh tied the knot in Italy and of course, they were happy and emotional at the same time.
Also Read: With Smile On Faces & Happiness In Their Hearts, Ranveer & Deepika Land In India As A Married Couple
As they returned to Mumbai yesterday, Deepika Padukone was glowing like a beautiful new bride. With sindoor in her hair, chooda on her wrists and a sparkling smile, Deepika celebrating the griha pravesh ceremony at Singh’s residence in Mumbai.
Twitter
On the other side was Ranveer Singh, looking calmer than ever. Perhaps, that’s what love does to you. But did you notice the Mehendi on his palm?
Twitter
What caught our attention was Ranveer Singh’s Mehendi that had Deepika written on it in Hindi.
Instagram
Of course, she’ll light up his life forever! Ranveer Singh and Deepika Padukone, congratulations. Lots of love to you both!
